description.en: Based on the popular horror radio show Magabanashi, this anthology captures supernatural stories that have taken on a life of their own across social media. Readers are cautioned that these tales come with risks, as they tap into deep-seated fears and blur the line between reality and the supernatural.

description.en:
Yeoju is a second-rate author living a mediocre existence in modern-day Korea. A tragic accident lands her in the plot of a bestselling martial arts novel and she wakes up as the infamous villainess Haewon Tang. Hoping to save herself from a gruesome death, Yeoju must figure out who to trust, harness Haewon’s inner chi, and learn martial arts as she fights to save the Sichuan Tang Clan. Can she change the outcome of the novel and prove she’s the worthy hero?

---
Our main character was an unsuccessful romance fantasy novelist when she gets into a hit-and-run then wakes up as the villainess in a best-selling martial arts novel. She uses the information from the novel that she had analyzed in her original life, in order to avoid her death-ending and finding the truth behind what had really happened to her.

Elle utilise les informations du roman qu'elle avait analysées dans sa vie d'origine, afin d'éviter sa mort et de découvrir la vérité sur ce qui lui est réellement arrivée.

description.hu:
Főszereplőnk egy sikertelen romantikus regényíró, aki autóbalesetet szenved és egy másik világban tér magához. Abban a világban, amiről nemrég olvasott. Méghozzá a regény gonosztevőjeként, aki elnyerve méltó büntetését a végén meghal. Csakhogy főszereplőnknek esze ágában sincs meghalni, helyette kiaknázza a sztori ismeretében és saját harcművészeti tudásában rejlő lehetőségeket.

description.id:
Seorang penulis novel romansa fantasi mengalami kecelakaan tabrak lari, tapi begitu sadar kembali, ia menyadari dirinya jadi Dang Haewon, pemeran pembantu dalam novel yang pernah ia baca. Namun, Dang Haewon adalah tokoh jahat dan kejam yang mencoba membunuh pemeran utama wanita demi mendapatkan pemeran utama pria hingga mengakibatkan dirinya terbunuh. Tidak mau nasibnya berakhir seperti itu, si penulis pun memanfaatkan semua informasi yang didapatkannya sewaktu membaca novel itu. Akankah dia berhasil mengubah nasibnya dan jadi tokoh terkuat di novel itu?

description.it:
Un'autrice di secondo ordine, Yeoju, si ritrova all'interno della trama di un bestseller wuxia, rivestendo i panni della famosa e spietata Haewon Tang. Nella speranza di fuggire da una morte orribile, Yeoju imparerà a utilizzare le arti marziali e a combattere per l'incolumità del Clan Sichuan Tang. Saprà volgere a suo favore la trama del romanzo dimostrando di essere una degna eroina?

description.ja:
現代でロマンスファンタジー作家をしていたはずなのに……　 「南宮世家の若当主」を読んで武侠系の小説家に転向しようとしていた矢先、交通事故に遭って小説の世界に異世界トリップ…！？ しかもそこでの私は最強の悪女”唐海苑”！ 唐海苑が死ぬという物語の結末を知っている私が、このままみすみす犬死するわけにはいかないでしょ！ 未来はこの手で変えてみせる…！

description.ko:
"하필이면 주인공도 아니고,
소설 속 제일가는 악녀라니…"

월세 탈출을 위해 읽기 시작한 무협 소설 『남궁세가 소가주』
그중 최고 악녀 당해원으로 빙의하게 된다.

흠모하던 남자를 얻기 위해
남자의 정인에게 독약을 먹이고,
무림의 고수들을 이간질하고,
마교의 앞잡이가 되어 강호를 혼란에 빠뜨리는
…세계관 최고 악녀, 당해원.

"소설처럼 이렇게 당할 순 없어...!!"

우연히 삼킨 만년삼으로 인해
세계관 최강자가 되어버린
무협 소설 속 최고 악녀 "당해원"의 갱생기!

description.pl:
Nasza główna bohaterka była marną powieściopisarką romansów fantasy, aż pewnego dnia została potrącona w wypadku i obudziła się jako czarny charakter w bestsellerowej powieści o sztukach walki. Wykorzystuje informacje z powieści, które przeanalizowała w swoim pierwotnym życiu, aby uniknąć śmierci i odkryć prawdę o tym, co tak naprawdę się z nią stało.

Наша главная героиня была несостоявшейся писательницей фантастических романов, но когда ее сбивает машина, она просыпается злодейкой в романе-бестселлере боевых искусств. description.th:
ตัวเอกก็ไม่ใช่ แต่มาเป็นตัวร้ายที่ร้ายที่สุดในนิยายเนี่ยนะ…' 
เมื่อนักเขียนอย่างฉันอยากจะลองเปลี่ยนสไตล์การเขียน จึงเริ่มต้นอ่านนิยายกำลังภายในเรื่อง 『นายน้อยแห่งตระกูลนัมกุง』 และเพราะอุบัติเหตุ จู่ๆ ก็ดันได้เข้ามาสิงอยู่ในร่างของทังแฮวอน วายร้ายในนิยายเรื่องนั้นซะได้
เธอร้ายถึงขนาดที่วางยาพิษหญิงสาวผู้เป็นที่รักของชายหนุ่มที่นางรัก แถมยังยุยงให้เหล่าชาวยุทธ์ในยุทธจักรแตกคอกันอีก เท่านั้นยังไม่พอ นางยังทำให้คนของลัทธิปีศาจเข้ามาสร้างความวุ่นวายในยุทธภพอีกด้วย
แต่ฉันจะไม่ยอมมีจุดจบแบบทังแฮวอนในนิยายหรอกนะ ฉันจะมีชีวิตใหม่ ด้วยการเป็นวายร้ายที่แข็งแกร่งที่สุดให้ดู!

description.zh-hk:
「不但不是主角，還偏偏是書裡最惡毒的女人...」

為了擺脫租屋生活
而開始閱讀武俠小說《南宮世家少主》，
卻穿越成為了小說裡最惡毒的女人——唐海媛。

唐海媛這個天下第一惡女為了得到欽慕的男人，
不惜毒殺思慕之人的情人、挑撥武林高手們、
成為魔教的走狗並導致武林動盪。

「絕不能和原本的故事內容一樣，白白送死!!」

偶然吃了萬年參而變成小說世界裡的最強者，
武俠小說最強惡女「唐海媛」的重生記!

altTitles.en: Golf King

altTitles.ja: キングゴルフ
高球王

description.en:
In Teirin High School, you are either part of a gang or an elite sports player. Sousuke Youki, called 'the predator,' is an undefeated master at fighting. One morning, as he finishes up a fight, Kazumi, a prodigy amateur golf player, took a look at Sousuke, ignored him, and walked right by. Infuriated, Sousuke sets out to get revenge on Kazumi for dissing him but Sousuke's revenge takes a detour as he gets himself involved in playing golf by the thuggish golf coach. Will this delinquent break legends and become "the King of Golf"?  
  
King Golf also won the 56th Shogakukan Manga Award in January 2010 in the boys category.

title.en: Hero x Demon King x Villain

altTitles.en: Heroes & Demons & Villains

altTitles.es-la: Héroes y Reyes, Demonios y Villanos

description.en:
A noble <Hero> who punishes evil while under the protection of gods.
A demon born with tremendous demonic powers, is the last surviving <Demon King>.
And I’m an experienced third-rate <Villiain> that roams around the land.

I want my Villain’s life to be over.
I was going to retire and spend the rest of my life in comfort but the child I picked up by accident turned out to be the demon king and the hero is chasing me to "repay the favor".
My comfortable retirement years are ruined!

The 99 demons that guard the Villain ?
Prepare to die… Yes, may God bless you, now die!
description.ko:
신들의 가호를 받아 악을 처단하는 고결한 ‘영웅’.
악마의 힘을 받아 태어난 강력한 마족 최후의 생존자 ‘마왕’.
악의 조직을 전전하는 숙련된 삼류 ‘악당’.

악당 생활도 이젠 끝이다. 은퇴해서 편안한 여생을 보내려 했더니
우연히 주운 녀석은 마왕이고, 영웅 녀석은 은혜를 갚겠답시고 찾아와
내 편안한 은퇴 생활을 망치고 있다!

악당을 가호하는 아흔아홉 악마시여….
신의 축복이나 받고 뒈지소서!

description.en: A pro player suddenly finds himself transported into a game, inhabiting their own max-level priestess character. Now, he teams up with a dragon-maid girl, embarking on a journey in a different world! But wait... Why are all these ladies looking at her so strangely?

Yankee High School Girl Kuzuhana-chan

altTitles.pt-br: Garota Delinquente Do Ensino Médio Kuzuhana-chan

description.en: At the beginning of the academic year, Saotome Hodaka enrolls into Moteshiro Prefectural High School, a former all-girls school that had recently integrated, but discovers it has a male to female ratio of 1:359! While most might think of this as a paradise, the majority of the students are delinquents and Saotome immediately finds himself being extorted by some of the more aggressive girls. However, he is inadvertently saved by Hanako Kuzuryu, a beautiful delinquent who just wants to be left alone. Is this the start of a new friendship? And how will Saotome's life unfold in a school full of troublesome women?
description.fr: Au début de l'année scolaire, Saotome Hodaka intègre le lycée préfectoral de Moteshiro, ancien établissement réservé aux filles et récemment devenu mixte. Il découvre rapidement que le ratio garçons/filles est de 1:359! Bien que cela puisse sembler être un paradis pour certains, la majorité des élèves sont des délinquantes, et Saotome se retrouve aussitôt extorqué par certaines des filles les plus agressives. Par chance, il est sauvé malgré lui par Hanako Kuzuryu, une belle délinquante qui aspire seulement à être laissée en paix. Est-ce le début d'une nouvelle amitié ? Comment la vie de Saotome évoluera-t-elle dans une école pleine de filles turbulentes ?
description.ja: 男女比率1対359!! 359人の女子高生にいじられまくり!! つらたんハーレム学園ラブコメ!! コワかわ最強ヒロイン爆誕!! 四方八方ギャルだらけな県立茂手城高校に入学した黒一点・早乙女穂高は、ヤンキーJK・九頭竜華子にピンチを救われて…!?
description.pt-br: Uma proporção de homem para mulher de 1:359?! Saotome-kun é admitido em uma escola cheia de gyarus e conhece uma garota delinqüente chamada Hanako Kuzuryu.

altTitles.ja-ro: Tenshi wo Ikasete Item Get!! Ikigacha de Dungeon Kouryaku!

description.en:
One day, Haruma Kozai was suddenly transported to a town centered around a dungeon. The special skill he was given was [Summon Angel].

This skill with a mysterious name does not simply summon an angel - rather it's a slightly strange skill in which angels are summoned for a price.

 ...At least that's what he thought, but it seems like “pleasure” is the price to pay!?

Make the summoned angel cum and decide on the cheat boost. A very naughty journey to another world begins~!
description.ja:
ある日突然、ダンジョンを中心とした街に転移してしまった【香西遥真】。
彼が授かった特殊スキルは【召喚天使】というものだった。

不思議な名前のこのスキル、天使を召喚するのではなく、
天使が対価を受けて召喚する、ちょっとヘンテコスキル。

...なんて思ったけど、
なんと「快楽」が対価になるようで――!?

召喚天使をたっぷりイカせて、チートブースト決める、
かなりエッチな異世界攻略、始まります♪
 
--- 
 
Aruhitotsuzen, danjon o chūshin to shita machi ni ten'i shite shimatta [Kōzai haruma]. Kare ga sazukatta tokushu sukiru wa [shōkan tenshi] to iu monodatta. 

Fushigina namae no kono sukiru, tenshi o shōkan suru node wa naku, tenshi ga taika o ukete shōkan suru, chotto hentekosukiru. 

... Nante omottakedo, nanto "kairaku" ga taika ni naru yō de ――!? 

Shōkan tenshi o tappuri ika sete, chītobūsuto kimeru, kanari etchina i sekai kōryaku, hajimarimasu ♪

altTitles.ja: 異世界スーサイド・スクワッド

altTitles.en: Suicide Squad Isekai

altTitles.ja: お前、タヌキにならねーか?

altTitles.en: Would you like to be a Tanuki?

altTitles.vi: Bạn có muốn làm gấu mèo không?
Này, có muốn làm Tanuki không?

description.en:
"Tired of life? Be a tanuki!"

A story of being scouted by a raccoon dog when trying to die.
description.ja: 大事なことは、タヌキになったら見つかるかも。タヌキのこがね丸は、今日も山の住人を増やそうと人間たちをスカウトしに街へ繰り出す。「お前、タヌキにならねーか?」仕事に疲れたOL、 性格に難ありのホスト、親との関係に悩むいじめっ子など、様々な問題をかかえた人々が、タヌキになってみたことで人生で本当に大切なことを見つけなおしていく。
description.vi:
Ngọn đồi nơi chú gấu mèo/tanuki Kogane Maru sống ngày càng ít "cư dân" vì những chú gấu mèo ở đây lần lượt biến thành người rồi đi đến thành phố sinh sống. Vậy nên Kogane có nhiệm vụ xuống thị trấn để "chiêu mộ" thêm cư dân gấu mèo về đây ở. Kogane gặp những mảnh đời bất hạnh, những người bị bắt nạt hay những người có rắc rối với gia đình... để cho họ một cơ hội: bạn có muốn làm gấu mèo không?

Sunflower Group:
Giữa dòng đời tấp nập vô thường, bỗng có một ngày bạn nhận ra sống thật mệt mỏi.

Vất vả lắm đúng không? Chán nản lắm chứ gì? Muốn nghỉ ngơi? Muốn buông xuôi? Muốn từ bỏ? 

Đã thế thì... "Này, có muốn làm Tanuki không?"

altTitles.ja: キン肉マン

description.en:
Kinnikuman (Muscleman), a weak and clumsy super hero, constantly getting into wacky situations. As the series progressed, the story began changing from comedy to action as Kinnikuman battles stronger and stronger foes in the wrestling ring. The series continually introduced new Super Human characters, known as Chojin, who would challenge Kinnikuman and his friends for various purposes.  
    
---
- **The initial serialization lasted from 1979-1986 and ended with Vol. 36. The series directly continued in 2011 with Vol. 37.**
- **The 2011 Chapters resets the Count to 1 during it set of volumes (Beyond Vol 36)**

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 1985**
description.pt-br:
Kinnikuman (Homem Músculo), um super-herói fraco e desajeitado, constantemente entrando em situações malucas. À medida que a série avançava, a história começou a mudar de comédia para ação, enquanto Kinnikuman lutava contra inimigos cada vez mais fortes no ringue de luta livre. A série continuamente introduziu novos personagens Super Humanos, conhecidos como Chojin, que desafiariam Kinnikuman e seus amigos para vários propósitos. 

A serialização original foi de 1979-1986 e terminou com o Vol. 36. A série continuou diretamente em 2010. 

Ganhou o Shogakukan Manga Awards por melhor Shounen em 1985.

altTitles.en: Be Blues!

altTitles.ar: BE BLUES! ~นักเตะเลือดซามูไร~

altTitles.ja: BE BLUES!～青になれ～
ビーブルーズ!　〜あおになれ〜

description.en:
If you're born in Japan and you play football, you'll eventually want to wear the national team uniform! It's the same for everyone! Ichijou Ryuu is a boy whose dream is to become a Japan national team player. With his twin childhood friends, Yuuto and Yuki, their first goal is to win the Japan Under-12 Football Championship!  
The excitement of a one-on-one! The tension in front of goal! The elation from pulling off the perfect link up play! The essence of what makes football enjoyable is here.  
  
Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Best Shonen Manga in 2014.  


---
description.ru: Рию Ичиджо мальчик, которые мечтает попасть в национальную команду по футболу. Вместе со своими друзьями, братьями-близнецами Юто и Юки, он сначала стремится выиграть в национальном чемпионате младшей лиги. В начальной школе его сбивает машина, когда он защищает от неё своего друга. Попав в больницу на 2 года, Рию преодолевает жёсткую реабилитацию. И вот он поступает в старшую школу и присоединяется к школьной футбольной команде. На тренировках не жалеет себя, хотя травмы напоминают о себе. Сможет ли он попасть в команду мечты или он должен быть обычным школьником?
description.vi:
Ichijou Ryu là một cậu bé mang trong mình ước mơ được khoác lên mình màu áo của đội tuyển quốc gia Nhật Bản. Cùng với hai người bạn từ thuở thiếu thời của mình là cặp song sinh Yuto và Yuki, cả ba người đều hạ quyết tâm thực hiện cho bằng được mục tiêu đó của Ichijou Ryu. Trên chuyến hành trình của mình, Ichijou Ryu đã gặp phải những khó khăn nhưng cậu vẫn không nản chí mà vẫn tiếp tục bước đi. Một bộ manga cực hay về bóng đá và những nhân vật dành hết niềm đam mê vào nó.  


---

title.en: Kono Ai wo Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.ja: この愛を終わらせてくれないか

altTitles.en: Will You End This Love?

altTitles.ja: Kono Ai o Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.zh: 能让这份爱画上休止符吗

altTitles.vi: Chấm dứt tình yêu này đi được không?

description.en: Yuzu is Hayami Madoka's ardent fan. Having no friends or family that care for her, Madoka is her only solace. Being that Sachiko is Madoka's best friend, she is Yuzu's most hated existence. To vent, she opens a secret account where she posts malicious comments about Sachiko. When she discovers this, she instead attempts to befriend Yuzu and offers her a chance to talk to Madoka. However, an accident occurs and they end up switching bodies with Sachiko being left in coma.
description.vi:
Hachikawa Yuzu, một nữ sinh cấp 3 với cuộc đời học đường ảm đạm có một bí mật. Rằng thực chất cô ấy là một người hâm mộ cuồng nhiệt của Hayami Madoka, bạn cùng lớp và cũng là một nữ diễn viên nổi tiếng.
Yuzu, ngưỡng mộ và tôn sùng Madoka như một nữ thần, cảm thấy hạnh phúc khi chỉ đơn giản được học cùng lớp và nhìn ngắm Madoka mỗi ngày.
Lẽ ra chỉ như thế đã đủ, nhưng cho tới một ngày...
Một câu chuyện tình yêu méo mó nhưng đồng thời cũng vô cùng thuần khiết.

altTitles.ja: お忍び同棲

altTitles.en: Living With a Kunoichi

description.en: Tae, a beautiful 17-year-old girl, and Kotaro, a serious office worker. These two seemingly happy people have a secret they can't reveal to anyone - the rival ninjas of Iga and Kouga secretly live together in this laid-back romantic comedy!
description.ja: 17歳の美少女・たえと、まじめな会社員の小太郎。一見幸せそうに見える二人には誰にも言えない秘密があった――伊賀・甲賀のライバル忍者がこっそり同棲生活を送る、まったりラブコメ！
description.pt-br: Tae, uma linda garota de 17 anos, e Kotaro, um sério trabalhador de escritório. Essas duas pessoas aparentemente felizes têm um segredo que não podem revelar a ninguém - os ninjas rivais de Iga e Kouga vivem secretamente juntos nesta comédia romântica descontraída!

altTitles.ja: 花秘める君のメテオール

altTitles.en: Your Meteor, Hidden in Flowers

description.en:
"On that night, I became the cursed monster's bride—"

Stella, the eldest daughter of the Viscount Quinwitch, though she was adopted, lived happily with her kind family. However, one day, Stella's younger sister Lilinette was chosen as the "Monster's Bride". Once a century, a cursed monster confined to a castle requires a sacrifice, so Stella resolves to go there in place of Lilinette. And there, she meets the monster - a bloodstained vampire named Ravi.
description.ja:
“呪われた怪物”の花嫁は皆死ぬ、それが宿命――

怪物の花嫁――それは百年に一度、国のどこかに幽閉された人ならざる魔の生き物へ捧げられる生贄……。そんな生贄に選ばれた妹を救うため、身代わりの花嫁となることを決意した子爵家の長女・ステラは、ひとりで赴いた屋敷で血塗られた吸血鬼・ラビと出会う。人を喰らう怪物として疎まれるラビの、深い孤独を知った時、ステラは……？

altTitles.ja: アイツノカノジョ

altTitles.en: Someone's Girlfriend

altTitles.fr: La petite amie de ce mec

description.en: It's April of my third and final year in high school... But the beautiful girl I have a crush on is my best friend's girlfriend. Thus begins my year of treading on the dangerous ground...
description.ja:
気になるあの娘は、”親友の”彼女。

始まりの季節、春。主人公・リクの家を訪れた美少女・雫は「いいよ、何しても。」と、リクを誘う。しかし雫は、“親友（アイツ）の彼女”。
description.pt-br: É abril do meu terceiro e último ano no ensino médio... Mas a linda garota por quem tenho uma queda é a namorada do meu melhor amigo. Assim começa meu ano pisando em um terreno perigoso...

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

altTitles.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
No matter how hard things seem to be, there is always 'someone' watching over you.

A ghost who remained in this world with lingering attachments, one day encountered an office worker left exhausted from work, Nozaki.

"Nobody even looks at me..."

Nozaki was consumed with loneliness.
The ghost, who was all alone at the end of his own life, decided to watch over his daily life.

Though left at the mercy of his job, Nozaki desperately carried on each day.
Until one day, he encountered someone new.

The feelings he lost amid the restless day-to-day, through connecting with others, Nozaki will gradually take back.
description.ja:
どんなつらい時でも、見ていてくれる「誰か」がいる。

この世に未練を残してさまよっていた幽霊は、ある日、仕事に疲れた会社員、野崎と出会う。

「俺のことなんて、誰も見てないんだ…」

孤独感に打ちひしがれる野崎。人生の最後に一人ぼっちだった幽霊は、彼の生活を見守ってみることに。仕事に翻弄されながらも必死に日々を送る野崎。やがて彼に新たな出会いが訪れる。忙しない日々の中でこぼれ落ちてしまった気持ちを、野崎は人との関わりの中で、少しずつ取り戻していく――。

title.en: More Than Lovers, Less Than Friends

altTitles.ja: 恋人以上友人未満

altTitles.en: More Than Lovers, Less Than Friends

altTitles.pt-br: Mais Que Amantes, Menos Que Amigos

altTitles.ru: Больше чем любовники, меньше чем друзья

description.en: Ex-AV star Miyako unexpectedly runs into a former coworker at a marriage interview...?! The secretly connected pair are bursting with more pure energy than you can imagine! This cute adult love comedy hits different and will heal your soul.
description.ja: 東京から地元へ戻った宮子のお見合い相手は互いの秘密を握る元お仕事相手だった！　清楚な文学少女を演じていた元AV女優とオラオラ系男を演じていた元AV男優が素の自分に戻って再会した時、この上もなくピュアなラブが始まる…！カラダは恋人以上、ココロは友人未満!?
description.ru: Мияко, уволившаяся с работы и вернувшаяся в родительский дом, затеяла сватовство. Однако второй стороной оказался бывший коллега, знавший разные секреты.
description.pt-br:
A ex-estrela de AV(Adult Videos) Miyako inesperadamente encontra um ex-colega de trabalho em uma entrevista de casamento...?! O par secretamente conectado está repleto de energia mais pura do que você pode imaginar! 

Esta comédia de amor adulto é diferente e vai curar sua alma.

title.en: Shangri-La Frontier ~Kusoge Hunter, Kamige ni Idoman to su~

altTitles.ja: シャングリラ・フロンティア　～クソゲーハンター、神ゲーに挑まんとす～

altTitles.en: Shangri-La Frontier ~From Trash Game Hunter to God-Tier Gamer!~

altTitles.zh-hk: 香格里拉・開拓異境～糞作獵手挑戰神作～

altTitles.pt-br: Shangri-La Frontier - o caçador de jogos ruins experimenta um jogo Divino.

altTitles.ru: Рубеж Шангри-Ла: любитель игрошлака бросает вызов топ игре

description.en:
Second-year high school student Rakuro Hizutome loves nothing more than finding so-called “trash games” and beating the crap out of them. When he decides to change things up by playing a new, “god-tier” VR game known as Shangri-La Frontier (aka. SLF), he does what he does best: min-maxes, skips the prologue, and jumps straight into action! Rakuro may be a seasoned gamer, but a meeting with an old rival will change the fate of every SLF player forever.

Clad in nothing but shorts and a bird mask, Rakuro (player name: Sunraku) launches into the world of SLF. Things are going well at first as he takes down a goblin, a bunny, and even a python. But then Sunraku comes up against a huge, hard-hitting wolf known as Lycagon the Nightslayer. Will Sunraku’s years of “trash game” experience be enough, or is he about to suffer a rude awakening just a few hours into his SLF adventure?
description.ja: “クソゲー”をこよなく愛する男・陽務楽郎。彼が次に挑んだのは、総プレイヤー数3000万人の“神ゲー”『シャングリラ・フロンティア』だった!　集う仲間、広がる世界。そして“宿敵”との出会いが、彼の、全てのプレイヤーの運命を変えていく!!
description.pt:
A adaptação cômica do romance superpopular de Syosetu Ni Narou.  
  
Hizutome Rakurou adora jogos de merda. Seu próximo desafio é Shangri-la Frontier, o jogo divino com uma base de jogadores total de 30.000.000. Reunindo companheiros (ralé) em um mundo expansivo e encontrando velhos inimigos pelo caminho, ele mudará o destino de cada jogador.
description.ru: Главный герой истории — лидер таблиц рейтинга в посредственных малоизвестных VR-играх (так называемый «игрошлак») которые, тем не менее, полностью его устраивают. Но однажды он решается бросить вызов сверхпопулярной игре с 30 миллионами активных пользователей под названием «Shangri-La Frontier». Адаптация суперпопулярного романа из "Shousetsuka ni Narou".
description.pt-br:
O estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, Rakuro Hizutome, adora encontrar os chamados “jogos ruins” e dar uma surra neles. Quando ele decide mudar as coisas jogando um novo jogo de realidade virtual de “nível divino” conhecido como Shangri-La Frontier (também conhecido como SLF), ele faz o que faz de melhor: min-maxes, pula o prólogo e pula direto para Ação! Rakuro pode ser um jogador experiente, mas um encontro com um antigo rival mudará para sempre o destino de cada jogador SLF.

Vestido apenas com shorts e uma máscara de pássaro, Rakuro (nome do jogador: Sunraku) se lança no mundo do SLF. As coisas vão bem no início, quando ele derruba um duende, um coelho e até uma píton. Mas então Sunraku se depara com um lobo enorme e contundente conhecido como Lycagon, o Matador da Noite. Os anos de experiência em “jogos ruins” de Sunraku serão suficientes ou ele está prestes a sofrer um rude despertar apenas algumas horas em sua aventura SLF?

title.en: Isekai Craft Gurashi ~Jiyuu Kimama na Seisan Shoku no Honobono Slow Life~

altTitles.ja: 異世界クラフトぐらし～自由気ままな生産職のほのぼのスローライフ～

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Craft Gurashi ~Jiyuu Kimama na Seisan Shoku no Honobono Slow Life~
Isekai Craft Gurashi ~Jiyuukimama na Seisanshoku no Honobono Slow Life~

altTitles.en: Another World Craft Life: The Heartwarming Slow Life of a Free-spirited Production Worker
Isekai Craftsman: A Relaxing Tale of Chilling and Building from scratch

description.en:
Miyabi always had dreams of being an architect, creating buildings that would inspire awe in others. And in the MMORPG Yume Sekai, he was finally able to achieve that dream - even if his constructions were used entirely to house marriage proposals. 

One day, Miyabi received a message from the admins of the game - as his architecture was so good for couples, they are gifting him with a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to go to a new world. Assuming they mean a private server, Miyabi accepts - and quickly gets transported to another world.

After confirming that he was spirited away, Miyabi discovers that all of his crafting skills from the game are intact here. No longer tethered to his job in the real world, Miyabi now has a real goal: to build his own house and family.
___
**Official English:** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/isekai-craftsman-a-relaxing-tale-of-chilling-and-building-from-scratch)
description.ja: VRMMOの世界で【クラフター】として、理想の建築物を造っていたミヤビは、ひょんなことからゲームスキルを引き継いだ状態で異世界に転移してしまう。広大な自然を有する異世界で夢のスローライフを送る決意をしたミヤビは、冒険者のリズとともに素材採取に奔走！　規格外のクラフトスキルで旅先でもぬくぬく快適生活──！？

altTitles.en: The Shaman's Blade
Jakdu: Shaman's Blade

description.en: Kwon Yong-jin, a protagonist who doesn’t believe in superstitions, experiences unbelievable events right after his 16th birthday.
description.pt-br: Kwon Yong-jin, um protagonista que não acredita em superstições, experiencia eventos inacreditáveis logo após seu 16º aniversário.

title.en: I Thought My Time Was Up!

altTitles.en: I Thought I Didn't Have Long to Live!
I Thought It Was Time!

description.en:
Lariette, the daughter of the Duke of Blanchett, was told she only had three months left to live. She decided that she didn't want to go quietly, so she decided to create and complete her bucket list! 

1. Treat her maid Anne to cakes
2. Gain independence and wealth
3. Get rid of her fiancé, the Marquis of Secreb
4. Date someone handsome for three months
5. Take a trip to the West!

...But it was only after she ran away that she realised... the fact her terminal illness was a complete misdiagnosis!

---
Lariette, the daughter of the Duke of Blanche, was diagnosed with a terminal illness and three months left to live. She decided to try to achieve her bucket list since she was going to die anyway. First, dumping an older fiancé whom she doesn't even love. Second, dating the monster Duke of Candel for three months! But it was only after she ran away from him that she realized, the fact that her terminal illness was a complete misdiagnosis!

---
**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=825581), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4502291)

description.ko:
3개월 시한부 진단을 받은 공녀, 라리에트. 어차피 죽을 몸, 버킷리스트(라 쓰고 미친 짓이라 읽는) 달성을 해보기로 했다. 

첫째. 약혼자를 엿 먹이기. 
둘째. 괴물 공작 아스라한과 3개월 간 연애하기!  

그러나 그에게서 도망치고 나서야 깨닫고 말았다. 시한부 진단이 완벽한 오진이라는 사실을!

---
**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=825581), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4502291)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/haiyiwieshijuezheng/list?title_no=2313)
description.tr:
Leydi Lariet’e bir hastalık tanısı koyulmuş ve üç aylık ömrü kaldığı söylenmişti. “Zaten öleceğim, o halde aklımdan geçen her şeyi yapabilirim!” diye düşünen leydi, nişanlısına postayı koyup acımasız dükle bir ilişkiye başlamıştı. Olacakları işler çığırından çıkmadan önce bilemezdi. Aslında kendisine yanlış bir teşhis konulmuş, kısıtlı ömrü kalmamıştı! Bay Asrazan gülümsedi ve… “Şimdi kaçmaya çalışırsan bunun bedelini ödemek zorunda kalırsın.”

---
**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=825581), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4502291)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/haiyiwieshijuezheng/list?title_no=2313)
description.zh:
生命只剩最后三个月？
那我要和怪物公爵谈恋爱！
得知自己的生命只剩下三个月的拉丽爱特,想着反正自己活不长，索性在死之前完成自己的愿望清单!首先解决掉未婚夫老头儿，其次和怪物公爵埃斯拉翰谈三个月的恋爱!但逃离他身边之后，拉丽爱特才知道，自己的病竟然是…？!

altTitles.ja: 無頼男－ブレーメン－

description.en: Reiji and Kasuga head out to Tokyo to become the "Gods of Rock," but they seem to always attract trouble. On their way, Hayama Ryo and Fujii Ran join them in their quest. Despite its rockstar type look, this manga really is about action.
description.pt-br: Reiji e Kasuga vão para Tokyo para se tornarem os “Deuses do Rock”, mas parece que eles só conseguem atrair problema. No caminho, Hayama Ryo e Fuji Ran se juntam em seu objetivo.

title.en: Baby Prisoner of the Winter Castle

altTitles.en: The Baby Prisoner of the Winter Castle

altTitles.es-la: La bebé prisionera del castillo de invierno

description.en:
On the night the kingdom fell and the entire royal family was being executed, Clarisse, who naturally thought she would also die, heard something unexpected. 

“We cannot execute anyone who has not reached the age of eighteen. Instead, I will kill you the day you turn eighteen.” 

And so, Clarisse is given ten years to live. 
Clarisse then heads North as a “prisoner.” 
And she asks the Grand Duke for only one thing… 

“Um, is it okay if I take this friend with me? It’s my only friend.” 

But what Clarisse holds out is a rock? 

It’s a new life in the North! 
But this life as a “prisoner” keeps on getting better…?
description.tr:
Krallığın düştüğü gece ve bütün kraliyet ailesinin idam edildiği sırada, doğal olarak öleceğini düşünen Clarisse, beklenmedik bir şey duydu.
“18 yaşına ulaşmamış olan kimseyi idam edemeyiz. Bunun yerine, 18 yaşına bastığın gün seni öldüreceğim.”
Ve böylece, Clarisse’e yaşaması için on yıl süre verilir.
Clarisse sonra bir “esir” olarak Kuzey’e doğru yol alır.
Ve Büyük Dük’ten sadece bir şey ister…
“Uhm, bu arkadaşımı yanımda götürebilir miyim? O benim tek dostum.”
Ancak Clarisse’nin uzattığı şey bir taş mı? Kuzey’de yeni bir hayat!
Ancak bu “esir” hayatı daha da iyiye gidiyor gibi mi?

description.en:
Let's go to the offline meet-up with online gaming friends!

"MAKOTO" is a middle-aged man and newbie gamer who's excited for his offline meeting with "Ao", a veteran adventurer who has always been helping him out. However, the one who appeared for the meeting was... an elementary school boy!?

title.en: In This Life, the Greatest Star in the Universe

altTitles.en: I'm Going to Be a Big Star

description.en: Sun Woo-joo, an aspiring idol with shining talent, dedication, and passion, had only one shortcoming: "dancing." Having to give up on his lifelong dream of becoming an idol due to this one flaw, he was preparing for a different path in life when a miracle suddenly appeared! "I'll become a superstar brighter than anyone." His once lacking dance skills were no longer a problem. The UV Starship. Five perfectly prepared idols are finally ready with everything they need. A monstrous rookie is about to debut in the entertainment industry! Presenting 'The New Black.' This life, he's destined to be a cosmic superstar!

title.en: Put It All In The Ring! 2

altTitles.en: Put it all in the Ring 2

altTitles.ja: リングにかけろ2 最終章

description.en: At the end of Ring ni Kakero 1, Ryuuji Takane went up against Superstar Jun Kenzaki for the World Title. Now, 17 years later, Rindo Kenzaki, the son Jun Kenzaki and nephew of Ryuuji Takane, lives with Ishimatsu Katori, the "Kenka Champion" from Ryuuji and Jun's time. Rindo will meet up with a new generation of boxers to create a new Golden Japan Jr. to take on the world.

altTitles.en: I Am a Daughter Loved by the Devil
I Am the Beloved Daughter of the Devil
The Devil's Beloved Daughter

altTitles.pt-br: Sou a amada filha do diabo

description.en:
I'm Mia, a child abused by my family. One day I had a 'dream' and saw the future. A future where I fell for my aunt and uncle's schemes, accidentally murdered my older half-brother, and causing a great war. Things just can't end like this, so I'll change the future with my own hands! 

With the information gathered from the dream, the first thing I have to do is find my biological father!

"Gimme thild thupport!"

(If only I didn't lisp!) In return for selling information about my uncle's schemes and taking all the backlog of child support from my biological father, I was planning on leaving…

But then my eldest brother, who boasts an aloof beauty, said, "I'm thinking of building you an amusement park."

My reckless second eldest brother interrupted and said, "Shall I buy you a tropical island covered with pretty flowers?"

And the most handsome man in the world, my Papa, replied on a whole nother level! "I'll buy you an artifact which calls for mermaids."

No, no, no! All three have terrible liquidity! The cleverest, smartest, most materialistic, devilish answer is… "Please make me a slide made of pure gold!"

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%A7%88%EC%9D%98-%EC%82%AC%EB%9E%91%EC%9D%84-%EB%B0%9B%EB%8A%94-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%B4%EB%9E%98%EC%9A%94/3114), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60450303)
description.ko:
"양유삐 주세요!(양육비 주세요!)"

외숙부와 이모에게 학대를 받으며 살던 미아. 어느 날, 그녀는 꿈 속에서 자신이 외숙부의 계략에 넘어가 친오빠를 살해하고, 세계 멸망을 일으키는 미래를 보게 된다.

이렇게 죽을 수는 없지! 미래는 내 손으로 바꾼다!

미아는 친부에게 외숙부의 흉계를 팔아 넘기고, 밀린 양육비에 정보 비용을 얹어서 청구하기로 결심하는데...

나는 제법 심각한 표정을 지으며 입을 열었다. 양손도 자랑스레 펼쳐 보인 채였다.

"샤다 샤. 그삐 정보에 단됸 천 골드! (싸다 싸. 극비 정보에 단돈 천 골드!)"

저기, 세계 멸망을 막을 정보 사실래요?

_

"꽃이 예쁘게 피는 열대 섬 하나 사줄까?"
아벨이 이렇게 말하자마자,

"섬에 아무것도 없으면 심심할테니 큰 오빠가 놀이동산을 하나 지어줄까 해."
카이옌 오빠가 끼어들고,

"나는 인어를 부르는 아티팩트를 사주마. 그게 있으면 밤새 인어의 노래를 들으며 놀 수 있을 거다."
아빠는 한 술 더 뜬다!

나는 영리하고 똑똑한 속물 악마답게 공손히 입을 열었다.

"미끄럼틀은 순금으로 만들어 주세요."

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%A7%88%EC%9D%98-%EC%82%AC%EB%9E%91%EC%9D%84-%EB%B0%9B%EB%8A%94-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%B4%EB%9E%98%EC%9A%94/3114), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60450303)
description.pt-br:
Mia cresceu sendo abusada por seu tio e tia. Um dia, em um sonho, ela vê um futuro que cai no esquema de seu tio e tia maternos, mata seu meio-irmão e causa uma grande guerra. Não pode acabar assim, o futuro está em minhas mãos! O primeiro passo nesse esforço é encontrar o pai que você conheceu em seu sonho!

“Dê-me uma carona!”

Em troca de vender as artimanhas do meu tio materno para o meu pai biológico, eu planejava sair com a pensão alimentícia e os custos de informação...
“Estou pensando em construir um parque de diversões.”

Quando o irmão mais velho, que se orgulha de nobre beleza, disse: “Você gostaria de me comprar uma ilha tropical com lindas flores?”

Meu segundo irmão não vai intervir, "Eu vou te comprar um artefato que chama uma sereia."

O pai mais bonito do mundo tem mais uma bebida! não! Todos os três são extremamente ruins para o dinheiro!!! A resposta diabólica do esnobe esperto e esperto é... “Faça o slide de ouro puro!”

---

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

title.en: I Became the Only Healer in This World

altTitles.ru: Я стала единственным хилером в этом мире

altTitles.ja: この世界で唯一のヒーラーになりました

description.en:
Healer who is addicted to gambling has been on a single path for years. Somehow, the world changed and I became the world's only healer. [There is a place that needs you, a unique healer.] [Will you respond to the summons?] ‘What? 'You have a tank dealer but no healer?' No, what. Is there any balance for X network with tank damage but no healer? [The constellations watching you complain that this is not a game, but reality!] *** It has been several decades since the Gate appeared. I heard that a lot of strategies and data have been accumulated over the years. ‘Why is everyone proceeding so inefficiently? 'Frustrating?' I was serious about my strategy, so I just tried my best to close the gate. “It was you who saved me. “I made it so that only you can see it.” 1st place in the former rankings who were said to have been betrayed and went into hiding. “I need you. my savior “My life.” Head of the world's top 10 guild unions. “Don’t abandon me. Because I can’t breathe without you.” Up to 1st place in the current ranking. I was too busy clearing the gate, but strange guys started to come by. 

[Plate/Constellation/Hunter/Himsumjin/Munchkin/Yeojuwon Tower/Salvation]
description.ru:
Девушка, играющая за хилера на протяжении многих лет, так и не смогла ничего достичь. Однажды, невероятным образом она переместилась в другой мир, в котором не оказалось ни одного хилера.  
— Есть пати, которое хочет пригласить вас, невероятного и неповторимого хилера. Вы ответите на призыв?  
"А? У них есть танки и ДД, но ни одного хилера? У них тут вообще хоть что-то сбалансированно?"  — 
Это не игра, а реальность. И созвездия, защищающие тебя, будут жаловаться тебе на жизнь!    

***  
Врата появились несколько десятилетий назад. За это время накопилось множество тактик и сведений, но...  
— Что за унылые атаки в лоб? Ещё не надоело?  
Из-за очень наивной тактики врата брали напролом.  
— Это вы ведь меня спасли? Лишь благодаря вашим способностями.  
Преданный, скрывающийся бывший первый ранг...  
— О, моя спасительница, не покидай меня.  
...директор ассоциации 10 гильдий...  
— Прошу, не бросай меня. Я не смогу жить без тебя.  
...и даже нынешний первый ранг — каждый был восхищен ею.  
Когда она была занята тактикой прохождения врат, начали появляться странные дети, что совершенно не входило в её планы.

少女杀手阿墨
百人斩少女

Azumi is a manga series that concerns a young woman brought up as part of a team of assassins, charged with killing three warlords that threaten Feudal Japan with an agenda of war and bloodshed.

title.en: Watashi o Aisuru Sannin no Danna-sama

altTitles.ja: 私を愛する3人の旦那さま

altTitles.en: My Three Husbands Who Love Me

description.en: Rio Yamabuki died saving a cat. When she wakes up, she finds herself 15 years in the past, on the day her husband proposed to her. She believed that marrying him would bring her happiness. However, the reality was a disastrous marriage filled with her husband's abuse, caring for his parents, and ultimately being killed by her husband and his lover for insurance money. A grim reaper appears and tells her, "Redo your marriage as you wish." If she can redo her life from rock bottom, this time she will live for herself and seize happiness!! Just when she thought that, three high-spec men claiming to be her husband appear...!?
description.ja:
猫を助けて死んでしまった山吹理央（やまぶきりお）。

目を覚ますと、そこは15年前に、旦那からプロポーズをされる日だった。

この人と結婚すれば幸せになれると信じていた。
しかし現実は、旦那のモラハラ、義家族の介護、仕舞いには保険金目当てに
旦那と不倫相手の親友に殺された散々な結婚。

そこへ死神が現れ、猫を助けた代わりに、「お前の望む結婚をやり直せ」と言う。

どん底人生をやり直せるなら、今度こそ自分のために生きて幸せをつかみ取る！！
・・・と思った矢先、理央の旦那だと名乗るハイスぺ男が「３人」も現れて・・・！？

description.en:
The person who is ranked No.1 in the world rankings of the AOS League of Infinity game and the strongest person who is nicknamed the devil on the battlefield.
However, a man wearing a golden mask appeared before the strongest person who had suffered a setback in a traffic accident and was abandoned by everyone and proposed.
“If I come back, can I become a world championship winner?”
The strongest person who goes back to the past becomes the maestro who leads the battlefield between earth and other worlds and shows the best game of all time.
description.id:
Orang yang merupakan peringkat No. 1 di peringkat dunia game AOS League of Infinity dan orang terkuat yang dijuluki iblis di medan perang.
Namun, seorang pria bertopeng emas muncul di hadapan orang terkuat yang mengalami kemerosotan dalam kecelakaan lalu lintas dan ditinggalkan oleh semua orang dan mengajukan lamaran.
“Jika saya kembali, bisakah saya menjadi pemenang kejuaraan dunia?”
Orang terkuat yang kembali ke masa lalu menjadi maestro yang memimpin medan perang antara bumi dan dunia lain dan menunjukkan permainan terbaik sepanjang masa.

title.en: I Raised My Younger Sister Beautifully

altTitles.en: My Beloved Baby Sister
Raising My Little Sister Prettily
I Raised My Little Sis Beautifully

altTitles.ja: 妹を可愛く育てたら大公 様に溺愛されました

description.en:
When Princess Fleta, who has been mistreated her entire life due to being born with a curse, summons the basilisk and destroys the palace, Princess Cezanne regrets that things could have turned out differently if someone had been by Fleta's side. So when she miraculously finds herself six years back in time, she is determined to take Fleta under her wing and fill her baby sister's life with nothing but joyful light. Will Cezanne be able to dispel the darkness inside Fleta and rewrite the ending?

---
The imperial family collapsed during one night by the basilisk, the summoned beast of darkness which was summoned by the cursed princess, Fleta. “If there is a next life, then… Can I really be your younger sister?” If I had approached you a little earlier, would it have been different from now? The last time everyone regretted it, the time miraculously returned to 6 years earlier. If this is the second chance we've been given.
description.ru: Императорская семья рухнула за одну ночь из-за василиска, призванного зверя тьмы, которого призвала проклятая принцесса Флета. «Если есть следующая жизнь, то… Могу ли я действительно быть твоей младшей сестрой?» Если бы я обратился к тебе немного раньше, было бы всё иначе, чем сейчас? Последний раз все об этом пожалели, время чудесным образом вернулось на 6 лет назад. Если это второй шанс, который нам дан...

title.en: Naze ka Tsukaima no Usagi wa Boku wo Dekiai Shisugiteru

altTitles.ja: なぜか使い魔のウサギは僕を溺愛しすぎてる

altTitles.en: For Some Reason, My Rabbit Familiar is Madly in Love with Me

description.en: Aidan McGuire is a new magician in the ‘Guardians of the Order’. Every Guardian has a humanoid familiar, and summoning one is mandatory! But during the summoning ceremony, Aidan summons a cute rabbit! He was told ‘deeper contact’ was necessary for the familiar to showcase its true power… so when he tried kissing it, the rabbit disappeared and a young man named ‘Jougasaki Hidetora’ appeared in its place! A cute (?!) fantasy BL story about a magician with a vague memory of some other life.

title.en: I'll Try to End the Male Lead

altTitles.en: I Will Try to End the Male Lead
I'm Going to Kill the Male Lead
I'll Kill the Male Lead

altTitles.ja: 男主人公を殺す筋書きを描いてみます

description.en:
I, Kwon Jinha, began feeling sick after reading a romance novel.

I became connected to all the emotions and sensations of the female lead, Elvi.

I even went to the hospital due to severe pain and sorrow but the result said there’s nothing wrong with my body.

So, I ended up sending an email to the novel’s author, begging for the male lead to stop tormenting the female lead. But instead, all I got was a happy reply...

“Do your job properly, Elvi”.

I found myself possessing Elvi’s body in the novel.

I got slapped by the male lead as soon as I possessed Elvi’s body, upon that, I had only one thought.

“The male lead? It’s over if I kill him, right?”
description.ko:
로판 소설을 읽고 몸이 아파오던 나 권진하.

여주인공 엘비가 느끼는 감정과 감각이 모두 연결되어버렸다.

끔찍한 통증과 슬픔에 병원까지 찾아갔지만 몸에는 이상무.

결국 소설 작가에게 메일을 보냈다.

제발 쓰레기 남주가 여주 좀 그만 괴롭히게.

하지만 메일을 보냈더니 사이다 답장은커녕….

“일은 똑바로 해야지, 엘비.”

소설 속 엘비에게로 빙의해버렸다.

빙의하자마자 뺨을 올려붙이는 남주를 보고 든 생각은 하나뿐.

남주? 죽여버리면 그만이지.

altTitles.ja: 今朝も揺られてます

altTitles.en: They are Still Being Shaken This Morning

description.en: This is your typical story of a boy who's secretly in love with a girl, they both share a 20 minute ride on the commuter train on their way to different schools, will the boy be able to approach the girl and confess his love? And also... What he doesn't know: There's 3 other passengers that secretly support the boy's secret love towards the girl! Read now the hijinks that ensue when the boy tries to approach the girl; from the creator of *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* and *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.
description.ja: 午前6時58分舞原行きの通学電車。名前も知らないあの子と僕…とその乗客!? 高校生の男女2人が醸し出す甘酸っぱい雰囲気に、乗客たちが心情駄々洩れで盛り上がる!!
description.pt-br: Esta é a típica história de um garoto que está secretamente apaixonado por uma garota. Ambos compartilham uma viagem de 20 minutos no trem do subúrbio a caminho de escolas diferentes. O garoto será capaz de se aproximar da garota e confessar seu amor? E, além disso... O que ele não sabe: há três outros passageiros que secretamente apoiam o amor secreto do garoto pela garota! Leia agora as confusões que acontecem quando o garoto tenta se aproximar da garota; do criador de *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* e *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.

title.en: Guild no Uketsukejou Desu ga, Zangyou wa Iya Nanode Boss wo Solo Toubatsu Shiyou to Omoimasu

altTitles.ja: ギルドの受付嬢ですが、残業は嫌なのでボスをソロ討伐しようと思います

altTitles.en: I May Be a Guild Receptionist, but I'll Solo Any Boss to Clock Out on Time

altTitles.zh: 虽然是公会柜台小姐，但是因为讨厌加班所以要去单挑BOSS

altTitles.en: I'm The Guild Receptionist, But Since I Don't Want To Work Overtime, I Think I'll Just Solo The Boss

description.en:
"It's safe because it's a desk job, super stable because it's public work!"

Alina Clover thought being a receptionist for the Adventurers Guild would be her ticket to the good life... but her dream gig turns into an overtime nightmare whenever adventurers get stuck clearing a dungeon. To save herself from paperwork, Alina turns to the simplest solution at hand — beating down the monsters herself! A mysterious adventurer showing up out of nowhere, soloing the boss, then disappearing without taking credit is bound to create rumors, and Alina's treasured job forbids side hustles. So there might be trouble when the leader of the Silver Sword party discovers her secret...!
description.ja:
内勤だから安全、公務だから超安定！

そんな理想の職業「ギルドの受付嬢」となったアリナを待っていたのは、理想とは程遠い残業三昧の日々だった。

全てはダンジョンの攻略が滞っているせい！ 限界を迎えたアリナは、なんと大鎚を手に自らボス討伐に赴くのであった―。

altTitles.th: โตเกียวกูล-เล่ม

altTitles.ja: 東京喰種 －トーキョーグール－

altTitles.en: Tokyo Ghoul

description.en:
Lurking within the shadows of Tokyo are frightening beings known as "ghouls," who satisfy their hunger by feeding on humans once night falls. Ken Kaneki, an unsuspecting university freshman, finds himself caught in a world between humans and ghouls when his date turns out to be a ghoul after his flesh.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
description.ru:
Раса гулей существует с незапамятных времен. Ее представители вовсе не против людей, они их даже любят - преимущественно в сыром виде. Любители человечины внешне неотличимы от нас, сильны, быстры и живучи - но их мало, потому гули выработали строгие правила охоты и маскировки, а нарушителей наказывают сами или по-тихому сдают борцам с нечистью. В век науки люди знают про гулей, но как говорится, привыкли. Власти не считают людоедов угрозой, более того, рассматривают их как идеальную основу для создания суперсолдат. Эксперименты идут уже давно…  
  
Ничего этого не ведал Канэки Кэн, робкий и невзрачный токийский первокурсник, безнадежно влюбленный в красавицу-интеллектуалку Ризэ, частую гостью в кафе «Место встречи», где парень подрабатывает официантом. Не думал Кэн, что скоро самому придется стать гулем, и многие знакомые предстанут в неожиданном свете. Главному герою предстоит мучительный поиск нового пути, ибо он понял, что люди и гули похожи: просто одни друг друга жрут в прямом смысле, другие - в переносном. Правда жизни жестока, переделать ее нельзя, и силен тот, кто не отворачивается. А дальше уж как-нибудь!
description.pt-br: Em Tokyo, criaturas conhecidas como "Ghouls" vivem entre os humanos e os devoram para sobreviver. Alheio a eles, o jovem universitário Ken Kaneki leva uma vida pacata entre livros, até que um trágico encontro o coloca diante desses seres e o obriga a lutar por sua humanidade.

altTitles.en: 100 Floor Tower ~0.0001% Escape Probability~
100 Storey Tower

altTitles.ja: 地上100階

altTitles.en: One Hundred Storey Tower

altTitles.vi: 100 tầng trên mặt đất ~ Xác suất thoát 0,0001%

description.en:
21st Century, Tokyo. People called “challengers” are gambling their life trying to escape from the state-owned 
100 Story Tower to win 10 billion yen. 
But what will happen when Tatsuki Kuroumi awakes at this tower without remembering anything about his prior life, 
including entering the tower as challenger?
description.vi: Ở Tokyo, có một tháp đánh bạc thuộc sở hữu nhà nước mọc lên giữa trung tâm thủ đô .20 nam nữ tụ tập trong tòa tháp 100 tầng với 1 mục tiêu: thoát ra bằng mọi giá. Và phẩn thưởng sẽ là nhận được 10 tỷ yên,nhưng cơ hội thoát ra gần như bằng 0.

title.en: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden:  Kikuri Hiroi's Heavy Drinking Diary

altTitles.ja: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！外伝　廣井きくりの深酒日記

altTitles.en: Bocchi the Rock! Side Story: Hiroi Kikuri's Heavy Drinking Diary

altTitles.ru: Одинокий Рокер! Спин-офф: Дневник пьяницы Хирои Кикури

altTitles.vi: Bocchi the Rock! Ngoại Truyện: Nhật Ký Say Rượu của Hiroi Kikuri

altTitles.ja-ro: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden: Hiroi Kikuri no Fukazake Nikki

description.en:
25 years old Kikuri Hiroi is a "genius bassist" who leads the indie band "SICK HACK" and loves alcohol. 
She often gets drunk and breaks the equipment inside concert clubs, so she's often short of money. 
She lives in a 52-year-old bathless apartment so she borrows showers from her friends sometimes. 
Regularly attacked by anxiety about her future, she counters that with a alcohol-fueled "happiness spiral". 
What is her daily life like...?!

“Strength and power, that’s all there is in this world.” As someone living a poverty-stricken life, Yunfei, an orphan of the Donghua Clan, is considered the weakest in the world simply because he lacks power. To escape this wretched fate, he chooses the path of a eunuch. Yunfei receives the seed of the ultimate martial arts technique, the Extreme Yin Art of Bai Yihong, and becomes part of the emperor’s special forces as part of the [Great Murim Extermination Plan]. In this era of great upheaval, amidst constant intrigues and fierce power struggles, the story follows the escapades of “Yunfei”, a master of deceit and cruelty, as he navigates the world of martial arts with his ice arts!

title.en: Koori no Reijou no Tokashi kata

altTitles.ja: 氷の令嬢の溶かし方

altTitles.en: How to Melt the Ice Queen's Heart

description.en: Kagami Asahi: a blunt yet overly caring high schooler and Himuro Fuyuka: a classmate who never lets anyone near her, earning her the nickname "Ice Queen." These two never had any chances to meet, but from Asahi's meddling, the closed off soul of Fuyuka might just be showing change?
description.ja:
**「私に構わないでください」**

ぶっきらぼうながらも、世話焼きな火神朝陽と、心を閉ざし、他者を寄せ付けないことから"氷の令嬢″と呼ばれる氷室冬華。マンションの隣に住んでいるとはいえ、関わる機会がなかった二人だが、朝陽のお節介から冬華との関係性に変化が訪れ……。

altTitles.ja: 恐竜ちゃんと化石くん

description.en:
Rinko Shinobu may seem like a normal high school girl, but she is actually a hybrid between human and dinosaur. Although she usually stays in human form, sometimes her T-rex bits will pop out when she's distracted. The only person who knows her secret is the dinosaur nerd Kazuya Kobake, who tries his hardest to help hide her dinosaur form. But his distracting antics are drawing strange stares from their classmates and stressing him out…

(Source: Natalie.mu, translated)
description.ja: 大の恐竜オタクでぼっち男子の小化石也。高校入学初日、そんな彼の目に飛び込んだ衝撃的すぎる光景！誰もいない教室にたたずむ一匹のティラノサウルス…これは夢か、幻か、はたまたタイムトラベルか!!?

altTitles.en: Will you expose yourself today?!

description.en: Mini is a "Scum Detector", and her latest job is from a rich girl who wants to test her boyfriend's loyalty. However, her boyfriend, Zhao Yueming, is a straightforward gentleman, and Mini's usual methods don't work on him. This is a bit tricky for Mini, who is used to dealing with scumbags regularly. This game of tug-of-war between the womanizer and the one who understands them best is about to begin. Who will fall into the trap of love first?!

altTitles.ja: ギルティサークル

description.en: April! Sawaya Doji's college life at his dream school of Seio University starts with an encounter with the beautiful Kaede Hoshimi during the club recruiting fair. Sawaya believes that if he goes to Tokyo... if he joins a university... if he joins a club, he can get a girlfriend! It's a great way to meet new people, but what kind of club has he gotten himself into?
description.ja: ４月！憧れの青応大学へと入学した大学１年生・沢屋童二は、サークル勧誘期に美少女・星見楓と出会う。「東京に行けば…大学に入れば…サークルに入れば、彼女ができる！」と信じる沢屋は星見楓とともに派手目なサークルの新歓コンパへと参加するが……。沢屋が足を踏み入れたサークルの罪深き実態、秘密とは何か！？
description.pt-br: Abril! A vida universitária de Sawaya Doji em sua escola de sonho da Universidade de Seio começa com um encontro com a bela Kaede Hoshimi durante a feira de recrutamento do clube. Sawaya acredita que se ele for para Tóquio... se ele entrar em uma universidade... se ele entrar em um clube, ele pode conseguir uma namorada! É uma ótima maneira de conhecer novas pessoas, mas em que tipo de clube ele se meteu?

title.en: I'm Really Not the Evil God's Lackey

altTitles.en: I'm Really Not the Demon God's Lackey
I’m Really Not the Devil’s Lackey

altTitles.uk: Насправді я не слуга Злого Бога

altTitles.vi: Ta Thật Không Phải Tà Thần Chó Săn

description.en: Lin Jie is an otherworlder who manages a bookstore. He’s kind and always recommends soul-healing books for his dejected customers. Sometimes he’d even share his own works too. As time goes on, these customers start to respect him a lot. They bring simple local products every day to show their gratitude and ask for book recommendations. They even start telling tales of this ordinary shopkeeper. His respectful and cordial titles include “Hyena of the Evil God”, “Herald of the Flesh Gospel”, “Author of Cultes des Goules” and “Shepherd of the Stars”???
description.uk: Лінь Цзє – чужоземець з іншого світу, що став тепер звичайним власником книжкового магазину. Він доброзичливий і завжди готовий порекомендувати відвідувачам книги, що здатні зцілити їхні душі. Іноді, він ділиться і власними роботами. З часом, клієнти починають його дуже поважати. Вони щодня приносять йому маленькі сувеніри чи подарунки в знак подяки та просять у нього рекомендації щодо книги. Про цього звичайного крамаря навіть починають розповідати історії. Його з повагою та теплом звуть «Гієна Злого Бога», «Вісник Євангелія Плоті», «Автор Культу Упирів» та «Пастух Зірок».
description.zh: 穿越者林介经营着一家书店。他善良热情，总是向失意潦倒的客人们推荐治愈心灵的书籍，偶尔也会安利一下自己的拙作。久而久之，这些客人变得非常尊敬他，每天都会带来一些朴实的土特产报答他，向他请教推荐书目，并且向周边人也诉说着这个普通书店老板的事迹。他们尊敬而亲切地称呼他为——“邪神的鬣狗”、“血肉福音书的传播者”、“尸食教典仪的撰写者”、“群星的牧羊人”。“？？？”
